titleStmt.title: Sarahs sepulture, or A funerall sermon preached for the Right Honourable and vertuous lady, Dorothie Countesse of Northumberland, at Petworth in Sussex. By Richard Chambers Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Chambers, Richard, b. 1583.
R. H., fl. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for George Fairbeard, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the north entrance of the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the north entrance of the Royall-Exchange
